cbc8beac-caff-4a72-a9c6-027eda89370e.name: Frequency: Constantly
cbc8beac-caff-4a72-a9c6-027eda89370e.notes: Lose 1 HP per minute without it

f64f0ece-f992-4a10-8450-1da2075fecf9.name: Frequency: Hourly
f64f0ece-f992-4a10-8450-1da2075fecf9.notes: Lose 1 HP per 10 minutes after missing a hourly dose

0ca48948-0f99-4a03-bc31-3af87d5a3a7a.notes: Lose 1 HP per hour after missing a daily dose
